items.sentence: I remember when we used to fight all the time.
I saw Tom and Mary playing a game of dominoes.
Tom didn\'t want to make a big deal out of it.
Isn\'t there something you want to say to Tom?
It took Tom a long time to find Mary\'s house.
It was clear that Tom didn\'t want to help us.
I didn\'t know Tom was in Australia last year.
I hadn\'t considered not going to the meeting.
Tom might\'ve been the one who told Mary that.
Have you been having problems with your email?
